title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 186.1 - Distribution and sale of publications of education department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 186.1 - Distribution and sale of publications of education department

State Regulations
(a) The distribution and sale of department
publications shall be under the supervision of the Commissioner of

Education. (b) The department
publications may be furnished without charge for use in the
department. (c) Not more than one
copy of any department publication may be furnished without charge to any State
school official, head of State department, member of the Legislature, newspaper, education department of another state, donor to this department, school, library or other institution that is a member of the University of the

State of New York. (d) Whenever an
individual has contributed to or cooperated in the preparation of a department
publication, a reasonable number of copies thereof may be furnished to him
without charge. (e) No charge shall
be made for blank forms, reports, pamphlets and other printed documents
necessary or proper in the conduct of the official business of the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
186.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
